text: MESSAGE IN PUNJABI - please have your #COVID19 #vaccine when invited to do so. Don’t believe the myths/mis-information which are rife. Please share this widely to ensure our most vulnerable patients receive the vaccine 🙏🏽 @gsjosan @jagtarbasi @TanDhesi @DrNighatArif @SinghLions https://t.co/pdNv7dzM17
